pages.text: Sticking an ender pearl at the tip of an arrow makes it less safe to use.$(br2)$(3)$(l)Special:$() Teleports you at the target location. Enemies hit will also teleport to your position.$(br2)$(4)$(l)Important: Due to reports of endermites spawning on use, usage of this arrow is not recommended.
Combine a $(l:extrastuck:arrows/end_arrow)end arrow$(/l) and an ender pearl in a punch designix.
